#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{int p=0;
    while(true){
            int n,c=0;
            cin>>n;
            if(n==0)break;
            p++;
            int arr[n],sum=0;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                cin>>arr[i];
                sum=sum+arr[i];
            }
            int avg=sum/n;
            sort(arr,arr+n);
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                if(arr[i]<avg)
                    c=c+(avg-arr[i]);
                else break;
            }
            printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",p,c);
            //cout<<c<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
